plot: Evan works at, what seems to be, your average burger joint, but his creepy boss is making him suspicious of the 'average' part, and even the 'burger' part, so what's really going on at Totes Burgers?...
title: Totes Burgers
plot_es: Evan works at, what seems to be, your average burger joint, but his creepy boss is making him suspicious of the 'average' part, and even the 'burger' part, so what's really going on at Totes Burgers?...
